description: biomorphic form; abstracted standing female figure
image_copyright: © Estate of Harry Bertoia %2F Artists Rights Society %28ARS%29%2C New York
text: While teaching in the metalwork department at the Cranbrook Academy of Art in Bloomfield Hills, Michigan, Bertoia began making jewelry, essentially biomorphic sculptures in miniature. His lively explorations of abstraction influenced craft artists in the succeeding decades.
title: Brooch
